Sp-U: But wait, theres more!! Rainbow Doodle (spoilers)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): Special Breeds and Legendary Breeds: Sp-U: But wait, theres more!! Rainbow Doodle (spoilers)
By GoldenBoy on Sunday, January 5, 2003 - 11:06 am:

A week or so after returning to my ranch from
getting Doodle, things started popping.

Fact:
1) Must have unlocked Pickle to get Anonymous
Letter at 20 Soulmates

2) Must unlock Doodle

3) Must have 50 Soulmates (I had 55 when I got
Doodle so this triggered retroactively)

4) Ayase will notice some graffiti on your shed.
It turns out to be a message from the Soulmate
Advancement Association, congratulating you on
your 50 friends. It gives you the password
"RaIN_Bow" which unlocks the Rainbow Doodle.

It promises that you will love this monster. and
it seems nicer than a standard Doodle.

Speculation:
A) You may need the 3rd barn to get Rainbow.
During the dialog Holly talks about graffiti
isn't so bad because some monsters destroy sheds
instead.

B) This could be a hint to another event
involving a rowdy monster trying to wreck your
indestructible barn. I will raise a Doodle soon
to see if I can trigger anything.

C) The Soulmate Advancement Association may give
more monsters in the future. Also someone should
try to get Doodle sooner and see if there are any
events at 30 or 40 friends that I missed.
